title:
A note on double affine Hecke algebra for skein algebra on
  twice-punctured torus
abstract:
We construct a generalization of the $C^\vee C_1$-type double affine Hecke
algebra for the skein algebra on the twice-punctured torus $\Sigma_{1,2}$ using
the Heegaard dual of the Iwahori--Hecke operator recently introduced in our
previous article. We show that the automorphisms of our algebra correspond to
the Dehn twists about the curves on $\Sigma_{1,2}$. We also give the cluster
algebraic construction of the the classical limit of the skein algebra, where
the Dehn twists are given in terms of the cluster mutations.
